LanguageData.Cobra.label: cobra
LanguageData.Cobra.description: A large predatory snake. Cobras can be highly aggressive if provoked, and their bite injects toxic venom into the victim.
LanguageData.Cobra.tools.0.label: venom-fangs
LanguageData.Cobra.tools.1.label: head
LanguageData.Cobra_Leather.label: cobra leather
LanguageData.Cobra_Meat.label: cobraflesh
LanguageData.Cobra_Corpse.label: cobra corpse
LanguageData.Monkey.label: monkey
LanguageData.Monkey.description: A small primate, the monkey can use its curly tail to grab on to branches, leaving its hands free to do other things. Monkeys are selfish but clever, and can be trained to carry out fairly complex tasks.
LanguageData.Monkey.tools.0.label: left fist
LanguageData.Monkey.tools.1.label: right fist
LanguageData.Monkey.tools.3.label: head
LanguageData.Monkey_Leather.label: monkey leather
LanguageData.Monkey_Meat.label: monkey meat
LanguageData.Monkey_Corpse.label: monkey corpse
LanguageData.Boomalope.label: boomalope
LanguageData.Boomalope.description: Engineered for chemicals production, the boomalope grows a large sac of volatile chemicals on its back. Though it is weak and fragile for its size, other animals have learned to avoid it because of the huge explosion it produces when it dies. It can be milked to produce chemfuel - very carefully.
LanguageData.Boomalope.tools.0.label: head
LanguageData.Boomalope.tools.1.label: left hoof
LanguageData.Boomalope.tools.2.label: right hoof
LanguageData.Boomalope_Leather.label: boomalope leather
LanguageData.Boomalope_Meat.label: boomalope meat
LanguageData.Boomalope_Corpse.label: boomalope corpse
